thread.title: Vucevic scores 24 to lead Magic past Pelicans 110-107 in OT
thread.title_full: Vucevic scores 24 to lead Magic past Pelicans 110-107 in OT

title: Vucevic scores 24 to lead Magic past Pelicans 110-107 in OT
text:
Vucevic scores 24 points, grabs 14 boards, Magic defeat Pelicans 110-107 in overtime THE ASSOCIATED PRESS   10:33   10:34   
People: 
Florida (987) 

ORLANDO, Florida â€” Nik Vucevic scored 24 points and grabbed 14 rebounds and the Orlando Magic beat the New Orleans Pelicans 110-107 in overtime on Wednesday night. 
Anthony Davis had 33 points and 16 rebounds for New Orleans. Nate Robinson had 18 points. 
MAGIC: Rookie Mario Hezonja scored 19 points and Tobias Harris had 18 and eight rebounds. . Vucevic fouled out in overtime. . C.J. Watson was the only point guard available against the Pelicans. Elfrid Payton (hamstring) and Shabazz Napier (calf) were out. . Hezonja hit his first four shots, three of them 3-pointers. 
PELICANS: Davis hit two free throws with 12 seconds left in regulation to tie the score at 101 and send it to OT. . Ryan Anderson scored 11 points before fouling out. . PG Tyreke Evans had arthroscopic surgery on his right knee Tuesday. He's expected to be out 6-8 weeks. . C Omer Asik sat out the game with a calf injury. 
Up next: New Orleans hosts Miami Friday. Memphis visits Orlando Friday.
